name: Upshot
description:
This was a shoot-them-up game created for our Game Development course at Uppsala University, Campus Gotland. The producer was Sarah Norén and the product owner was Ricky Lilja.

Team:
Sarah Norén:  QA, sound design, animation & UX/UI design.
Ricky Lilja: Lead QA & sound design
Casper Gustavsson - Lead programming
Haoran Feng - Programming
Elian Rowan Morgana -  UI artist & background artist
Alva Wäppling - artist & animation
Dominykas Jecius - artist & animation
